fields.name: cancel_request
fields.description: Cancels an outstanding request.  Caller must own the request

fields.name: create_vault
fields.description: Creates a vault using given args

fields.name: delete_vault
fields.description: Deletes a vault using given args

fields.name: provider_claim_task
fields.description: Claim a manual task

fields.name: provider_complete_task
fields.description: Complete a manual task

fields.name: provider_resolve_approval_task
fields.description: Resolve an approval task

fields.name: set_profile
fields.description: Updates the callers profile information in their user vault

fields.name: set_role
fields.description: Set the role of a user

fields.name: update_provider_attributes
fields.description: Update Attributes according to SPARQL Document

fields.name: upsert_vault
fields.description: Returns vault if exists otherwise creates a new vault

fields.name: get_password_reset_questions
fields.description: Returns all available password-reset questions

fields.name: get_profile
fields.description: Returns the profile data of the current user

fields.name: get_provider
fields.description: Returns information about the logged in provider

fields.name: get_provider_policy
fields.description: Returns the policies created by the provider.

fields.name: get_provider_task_counts
fields.description: Returns count statistics for pending tasks

fields.name: get_provider_tasks
fields.description: Returns tasks belonging to the current provider

fields.name: get_provider_vaults
fields.description: Returns vaults belonging to the current provider

args.name: labels
args.description: Optional: explicit vaults to return.  scope and pagination are ignored

fields.name: get_user_vaults
fields.description: Returns the details of vaults specific to the caller as the data-subject

fields.name: query_provider_attributes
fields.description: Returns a result set from a SPARQL query

fields.name: search
fields.description: Returns all vaults that match the search term

types.name: activity
types.description: A set of metrics/analytics related to activity

types.name: attribute
types.description: A name/value pair stored in a manetu vault

types.name: duration
types.description: A period of time

types.name: event
types.description: A record of past activity

types.name: event_class
types.description: The class of event

types.name: event_notarization
types.description: The notarization details of an event

types.name: event_subject
types.description: The subject of an event

types.name: matchable
types.description: Maps to Matchable protobuf message

types.name: matchable_type
types.description: The types of matchables associated with an identity

types.name: mfa_status
types.description: User's MFA status

types.name: mfa_type
types.description: The types of supported multi-factor authentication methods

types.name: notarization_status
types.description: The status of a notarized event

types.name: pagination
types.description: A descriptor to paginate a potentially long response

types.name: password_reset_questions
types.description: Current password-reset questions

types.name: privacy_contact
types.description: Privacy contact

types.name: profile
types.description: The profile info for the logged in user

types.name: provider
types.description: Information about a Manetu provider

types.name: pup
types.description: A descriptor of a permitted use of data to be consented

types.name: pup_context
types.description: The context for a permitted use policy

types.name: range
types.description: A range of dates

types.name: raw_event
types.description: Raw event data

types.name: request
types.description: An outstanding data-subject access request

types.name: request_status
types.description: The status of an outstanding request

types.name: request_type
types.description: The type of outstanding request

types.name: role
types.description: The role of the identity

types.name: sum
types.description: An aggregate count of events at a specific timestamp

types.name: task
types.description: A unit of manual work to be done by a human

types.name: task_assignment_scope
types.description: Scope task queries by the state of assignment

types.name: task_counts
types.description: Statistics related to the type of tasks that are pending

types.name: task_order_by
types.description: Ordering criteria for task queries

types.name: task_ordering
types.description: Ascending or Descending order for task queries

types.name: task_spec
types.description: A task specification, used for querying task lists

types.name: task_type
types.description: The type of task

types.name: time_units
types.description: A unit of time

types.name: vault
types.description: A secure storage vessel for an identity

types.name: vault_info
types.description: Maps to VaultInfo protobuf message

types.name: vault_policy_query_type
types.description: This specifies the criteria for the match

types.name: vault_scope_flags
types.description: The types of vaults being requested

types.name: vault_state
types.description: The state of a vault

types.name: vault_status
types.description: The status of an identity (CLAIMED, REJECTED, etc)

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Skip the selection only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Include the selection only when the `if` argument is true.
